section.name: Low Level Design
section.p:
Objective
The low-level design of this component provides a description of the internal workings of the SearchAPI in terms of modules and their interrelationships and dependencies. The low-level design provides assurance that the SearchAPI subsystem has been correctly and effectively refined.

Scope
The LLD documentation presents Flowchart, Class Diagrams and Use Cases, in which describe the internal working activities of the component.
